body.p: Native of Kentucky. Worked as a farmer in Mercer County. Owned five slaves in 1850.

Spouse: Mary Bottom (Kirkland)
Children: William K. Bottom, Martha J. Bottom, Neoma Bottom, Pleasant T. Bottom
